DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize safety efficacy STA-9090 ( ganetespib ) subject hematologic malignancy .
DOC.brief_title: STA-9090 Treatment AML , CML , MDS Myeloproliferative Disorders
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Males females 18 year older Eligible subject must one follow relapsed refractory hematologic malignancy : AML , MDS , CML , myeloproliferative disorder define protocol Must acceptable organ function screening define protocol Exclusion Criteria Pregnant breastfeed woman Patients must meet washout period prior chemotherapy radiation History stroke within 6 month treatment Poor venous access study drug administration Treatment chronic immunosuppressant Other severe acute/chronic medical psychiatric condition , laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation
